title: Online Workshop on Addressing COVID-19 Vaccine Misinformation and Reducing Vaccine Hesitancy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic public health concepts and foundational digital literacy
context.additional_context: Establishing a Customized Content Delivery System and Pre-Post Comparative Assessment Framework Through Learner Analysis

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three types of COVID-19 vaccine misinformation and refute them with scientific evidence
Learners demonstrate a 20% or greater improvement in attitudes based on Adult Vaccine Hesitancy Scale (AVHS) assessment results
Learners complete at least 80% of interactive modules provided in the LMS and can apply core concepts
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
